Posts.Content: Apr 29, 2008 12:49PM mrimike wrote: My wife started chemo April 23rd.  We are planning a head shaving party tomorrow night.  We've been preparing the kids for it as best we can.  I'm going to let her shave mine also.  In some small way I hope it reminds her that we're in this together.
